tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clients (
    client_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE client_projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_name VARCHAR(50),
  project_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE recipe_development (
  recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  recipe_name VARCHAR(50),
  chef_name VARCHAR(50),
  recipe_description TEXT,
  recipe_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_status VARCHAR(50),
    project_deadline DATE
);

CREATE TABLE recipes (
    recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    recipe_name VARCHAR(255),
    recipe_progress FLOAT,
    recipe_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE client_projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  client_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE recipe_development (
  recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  recipe_name VARCHAR(255),
  chef_name VARCHAR(255),
  time_to_develop INT,
  ingredients TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE clients (
  client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_name VARCHAR(255),
  contact_name VARCHAR(255),
  industry VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE ClientProjects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_name VARCHAR(50),
  project_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE RecipeDevelopment (
  recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  recipe_name VARCHAR(50),
  chef_name VARCHAR(50),
  ingredients TEXT,
  instructions TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ClientFeedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  feedback TEXT,
  rating INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES ClientProjects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(50),
  title VARCHAR(50),
  hire_date DATE,
  department VARCHAR(50)
);
